Uses of Package
WHG

  • Classes in WHG used by WHG 
    Class and Description
    Ball
    This class is used to draw and update the blue balls in the game.
    Block
    This abstract class is used for a basic block in the game, including balls, walls, coins, and the square.
    Coin
    This class is used to draw and update the yellow coins in the game.
    Renderable
    This interface is used to draw the objects on the screen.
    Square
    This class is used to draw and update the red square in the game.
    Updateable
    This interface is used to update the objects on the screen mainly for the movement of them.
    Wall
    This class is used to draw the walls on the screen.
